DOC.brief_summary: - To test hypothesis supplementation DHEA least twelve week prior ovarian stimulation increase oocyte quantity ( number oocytes retrieve ) oocyte quality ( clinical pregnancy rate molecular marker ) follow IVF IVF/ICSI treatment . - To evaluate feasibility conduct large multicentre trial
DOC.brief_title: Dehydroepiandrosterone ( DHEA ) Intervention To Treat Ovarian Aging
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate role DHEA counteract effect ovarian age in-vitro fertilization ( IVF ) model . The study examine whether use DHEA could improve clinical pregnancy rate follow IVF treatment woman predict aged ovary increase oocyte quantity ( ovarian response gonadotrophin ) and/ improve oocyte quality . The oocyte quality assess morphological molecular marker . This study provide mechanistic framework translational research mechanism ovarian age drug intervention slow ovarian age process subsequent adverse physical psychological consequence . Further , data produce research potential influence clinical practice fertility clinic worldwide .
DOC.criteria: Women age 23 year diminish ovarian reserve ( predicted poorresponder ) , define antral follicle count < 10 and/or AntiMullerian hormone < 5pmol/L Women undergo IVF IVF/ICSI treatment Women must regular spontaneous menstrual cycle 21 35 day Women BMI > 35 Kg/M2 Women single ovary Women untreated hydrosalpinx/ submucous fibroid/ endometrial polyp start treatment Women history seizure disorder Women previous participation trial earlier treatment cycle Women know endocrine disorder congenital adrenal hyperplasia , thyroid disease , hyperprolactinemia Known allergy DHEA Diabetic woman insulin insulin lower DHEA level might reduce effectiveness DHEA supplement .
